verses.verse: וַיָּבִ֙יאוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vi-'u So they brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God וַיַּצִּ֣יגוּ <S%H3322><s%> vai-yatz-Tzi-gu and set אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch it in the midst הָאֹ֔הֶל <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel, of the tent אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָֽטָה־ <S%H5186><s%> na-tah- had pitched ל֖וֹ lo דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; that David וַיַּקְרִ֛יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> vai-yak-Ri-vu for it and they offered עֹל֥וֹת <S%H5930><s%> o-Lot burnt sacrifices וּשְׁלָמִ֖ים <S%H8002><s%> u-she-la-Mim and peace offerings לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him. God
